sourceText: Hmmm…I think that might be too much time. You have so much else to do every day.
text: Hmmm…I think that might be too much time. You have so much else to do every day.

sourceText: Um…because I am not doing my schoolwork?
text: Um…because I am not doing my schoolwork?

sourceText: That sounds reasonable. I would also like you to do your schoolwork before using any gadgets. Okay?
text: That sounds reasonable. I would also like you to do your schoolwork before using any gadgets. Okay?

sourceText: Armani, you have been spending a lot of time on your tablet. Why do you think I am concerned about that?
text: Armani, you have been spending a lot of time on your tablet. Why do you think I am concerned about that?

sourceText: Yes, that is one reason. It is important that you make the time for your schoolwork. I also like seeing you being more active. Maybe we can make a household rule about gadget use. What do you think would be a fair limit each day?
text: Yes, that is one reason. It is important that you make the time for your schoolwork. I also like seeing you being more active. Maybe we can make a household rule about gadget use. What do you think would be a fair limit each day?

sourceText: How about one hour for fun and one hour for learning?
text: How about one hour for fun and one hour for learning?
